name: Only one word
description:
game made for GMTK game jam 2019 

The team : Jaime Menéndez  and  Rafael de Miguel  , Spanish Architect and game designer respectively

Comments: It needs some more polish and the intended puzzle is somehow messed up but its a good showcase of the concept , we started actually really late so it was done rather in 15 hours than 48 , but great experience nevertheless.

Simple graphic adventure where the main mechanic revolves arrownd exchanging words with the other characters to modify the interaction.

Controlls

A-D-Move /spacebar-Talk/mouse-Interact
